snippet: Chris Kluwe, who said he was let go because he accused a coach of harassment and homophobic statements, is threatening to sue the team for not giving him the results of an investigation into his release.
abstract: Former Minnesota Vikings punter Chris Kluwe threatens to sue team for failing to share with him findings of investigation into allegations that he was released because he accused one of his coaches of harassment and homophobic statements; Kluwe, who is not gay but had spoken out in favor of same-sex marriage, is accusing team of violating state law prohibiting discrimination based on sexual orientation.
lead_paragraph: Chris Kluwe, who said he was let go because he accused a coach of harassment and homophobic statements, is threatening to sue the team for not giving him the results of an investigation into his release.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Punter Pressuring Vikings for Results of Inquiry
